mapper.select: select authority, userID from user where userID = #{userID} and userPW = #{userPW}
select * from user where userName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName}, '%') AND email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchEmail}, '%') ORDER BY joinDay DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(userID, userPW, userName, userNickname, email, postcode, roadAddress, jibunAddress, detailAddress, extraAddress, birth, firstTel, secondTel, thirdTel) VALUES(#{userID},#{userPW},#{userName},#{userNickname},#{email}, #{postcode}, #{roadAddress}, #{jibunAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{extraAddress}, #{birth}, #{firstTel}, #{secondTel}, #{thirdTel})
